Text.Page:
The Witches of Vadoma are the finest instructors of magic in the world, but they're no longer in their right minds.

{@LinkCreature:22#31#Serena}, our headmistress, is vicious and lashing out at everyone.

I don't have the power to face her, so I'm counting on you to stop her.

Serena's loss hurts us all, but at least she can't destroy us.

There may be time to resurrect her if we regain control of the academy.

...if not, looks like I'm getting promoted.

She knows every trick I've got, . She taught them to me, after all.

You're the only one who can face {@LinkCreature:22#31#Serena}.
